title: Client won't stop 'scanning files' - stuck at 0%.
body: Not sure how long this has been going on, but I cannot get past 0% and scanning files. I'm on a Mac. I've restarted the computer multiple times, tried swapping servers, nothing.

replies.body: Typically if you get stuck at 0% while patching it's a pretty good sign that your OS is blocking the patcher from scanning any files. You should be able to get that patch going by adjusting some of your [**administrator settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9), but let me know if that doesn't help!
